title: Lumex Raised Toilet Seat Riser with Removable Armrests, 4" High, Wide Contoured Seat
features: 4" TALL: Adds 4 inches of extra height to your existing toilet seat to reduce the difficulty associated with bending, sitting down, and standing up
REMOVABLE ARMRESTS: The armrests, which provide more stability and safety while sitting or standing, can easily be removed without tools via push-button locking mechanisms
LOCKING CLAMP: A locking mechanism securely clamps the toilet seat riser to most toilets to prevent unwanted slipping and movement while in use
CONTOURED SEAT: The heavy duty plastic seat is strong, durable and easy to clean. The wide, contoured design is molded to provide you with more comfort

TRUSTED BY PROFESSIONALS: Quality is the hallmark of all Lumex products. Trusted by healthcare professionals and end-users for over 50 years, Lumex features a full line of patient aids and specialty healthcare seating.
description: The Lumex 6487RA-1 locking raised toilet seat offers a unique choice of a convenient and comfortable raised height toilet seat with or without the armrests. Wide and comfortable, the 18.5 inch contoured seat will feel secure and safe with the front clamping locking mechanism designed to be used without the aid of tools. Adding 4 inches in height to your existing toilet, this durably constructed seat is strong and secure for up to 300 pounds of evenly distributed weight. Quality is the hallmark of all Lumex products. Trusted by healthcare professionals and end-users for over 50 years, Lumex features a full line of patient aids and specialty healthcare seating.
